short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whippet Notes is an AI-powered veterinary scribe, providing you with accurate and consistent notes instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Whippet Notes Chrome extension provides veterinary professionals with a convenient side panel interface to our web application, allowing them to efficiently record and manage veterinary consultations without leaving their current workflow.
